pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 Mb capable of OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9 Compatible

supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Japanese
